response:
"wasdenktihr?! 🤯‍♂️💻📱️️ wie kann man noch immer so naiv sein und glauben, seine personenbezogenen daten sind sicher in den händen von konzernen & regierungen? 😱 #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "what do you think?! 🤯‍♂️💻📱 how can people still be so naive and believe that their personal data is safe in the hands of corporations and governments? 😱 #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the topic of protecting personal information regarding data privacy. the author expresses their surprise and concern that people still have faith in the ability of corporations and governments to safeguard their personal data, suggesting that this trust is misplaced. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) are used to reach a wider audience on twitter and to connect the post to ongoing conversations around these topics.
